properties.name: The Core Total Body Salon and Wellness Spa
The Frisky Whisker (Whisker Lounge Cat Research and Therapy Center)
properties.review_summary:
People say this lounge offers a relaxing experience with friendly cats, tasty drinks, and great music. They also highlight the friendly staff, the chill vibe, and the unique events like cat yoga.

Other reviews mention the entrance fee can be high.

properties.name: Nectar Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes, including traditional hot yoga, Pilates/yoga blends, and relaxation and stretch. They highlight the welcoming and calm environment, and the strong sense of community. They also like the excellent teachers and the unique flows they bring to each class.

properties.name: Highland Yoga - Memorial
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of hot yoga classes, including hot power and hot slow flow, and they praise the amazing instructors, clean studio, and welcoming atmosphere. They also highlight the convenient times and locations, as well as the friendly and supportive staff.

properties.name: Atlanta Yoga Instructors: Private & Corporate Yoga Classes
Dancing Dogs Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes, including restorative, yin, Hatha, and slower flow, as well as workshops. They highlight the welcoming atmosphere, friendly and helpful instructors, and interesting, new flows. They also like the beautiful and bright spaces, and the availability of sweat towels and consent coins for hands-on assistance.

properties.name: Sati Yoga & Wellness
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes suitable for daily practice. They highlight the warm, welcoming, and inclusive environment, and the sense of community fostered by the management. They also like the calming and healing atmosphere, and the attentive and supportive teachers.

properties.name: X3 Sports - West Midtown
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers great workouts. They highlight the awesome coaches and the gym family atmosphere. They also like the amazing staff.

properties.name: exhale Spa Midtown Atlanta
properties.review_summary:
People say this spa offers a wide variety of fitness classes, spa services, and amenities, including a steam room, showers, and a well-equipped locker room. They also highlight the clean and quiet atmosphere, the friendly and professional staff, and the convenient free parking.

Other reviews mention the cancellation process can be difficult.

properties.name: Yonder Yoga - Midtown
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes, including heated and yin yoga, and has great instructors. They also highlight the clean and welcoming environment, with friendly staff and a strong sense of community.

properties.name: Highland Yoga - Virginia Highland
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging hot yoga classes, including Power Flow and All Levels Vinyasa, with a variety of class times and styles. They highlight the energizing flows, the knowledgeable and passionate instructors, and the welcoming and supportive community. They also like the clean studios, the great music, and the overall positive and calming vibe.

properties.name: X3 Sports - Inman Park
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers a variety of classes, including boxing, and provides a great workout. They highlight the friendly and helpful staff, and the supportive and welcoming culture. They also like the clean facilities and the attentive coaches who provide personalized help.

properties.name: Conjure Yoga & Ritual
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers expertly taught, accessible, and fun classes full of wisdom and heart. They highlight the intimate, bright space with room to stretch, flow, and conjure, and the inclusive practices that encourage expansion, rest, deep listening, and play. They also like the sweet community and great teachers.

properties.name: M3 Yoga & Hot Pilates Atlanta
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of yoga styles, including hot power flow and hot Pilates, as well as non-heated options. They highlight the welcoming and supportive community, and the friendly and inviting staff. They also like the clean and lovely space.

properties.name: Bring It Om® Yoga Studio
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging and creative flows, including Power Flow and Slow Flow classes. They highlight the knowledgeable and encouraging instructors, and the welcoming and unpretentious vibe. They also like the clean and well-maintained space.

properties.name: Body & Brain Yoga Tai Chi
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers tai chi classes that help improve flexibility, balance, and overall well-being, and they also highlight the sense of community and support among fellow students. They like that the practice goes beyond physical movement, teaching them to connect with their bodies, emotions, and inner strength.

properties.name: Highland Yoga - Decatur
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes, including High Power Flow and Slow and Steady, with smooth and consistently delivered sequences. They highlight the clean and inviting space, and the convenient parking validation. They also like the friendly and encouraging instructors, and the well-organized space with all the necessary tools for a deep practice.

properties.name: The Intown Retreat
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of yoga classes, massages, and a sauna and cold plunge. They highlight the relaxing and welcoming vibe, and the spacious lounge area with complimentary teas and waters. They also like the friendly and helpful staff, and the knowledgeable instructors.

properties.name: HOTWORX - Atlanta, GA - Decatur
properties.review_summary: People say this fitness center offers a variety of workouts, including Hotworx. They highlight the clean facilities and welcoming vibe. They also like the friendly and helpful staff.

properties.name: Haven Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of non-heated classes, including flow, yin, gentle, and Pilates + flow. They highlight the flexible membership and class pack options, and the clean, bright studio with a good array of props. They also like the kind, thoughtful, and knowledgeable instructors who provide hands-on adjustments.

properties.name: Yonder Yoga - Westside
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging and fun flows, including prenatal yoga. They highlight the welcoming community, amazing instructors, and clean facilities. They also like the consistent lingo and structure across classes, and the special events each month.

properties.name: The Good Life Yoga and Wellness
Highland Yoga - Westside
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers hot yoga classes. They highlight the clean studios and convenient schedule. They also like the amazing instructors and relaxing, refreshing experience.

properties.name: ISO Yoga Studio
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers hot yoga sessions that leave them feeling refreshed and renewed. They highlight the challenging and motivating classes, and the variety of instructors with different teaching styles. They also like the nice changing rooms with high-quality bath and body products.

properties.name: Life Time
properties.review_summary:
Some gym goers say this gym offers a wide variety of classes, state-of-the-art equipment, luxurious amenities like a sauna and steam room, and a strong sense of community.

Other reviews mention parking can be limited and the pickleball program can be poorly managed.

properties.name: Highland Yoga - Buckhead
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging flows, restorative classes, and sculpt classes. They highlight the welcoming and inclusive environment, and the clean and serene space. They also like the kind, relatable, and encouraging instructors.

properties.name: Mysore Yoga Atlanta
properties.review_summary: Students say this yoga studio offers a welcoming atmosphere and personalized instruction in Ashtanga yoga, including Mysore classes for all levels, from beginners to experienced practitioners. They also highlight the beautiful and serene space, with its authentic decor, amazing plants, and tea party area, as well as the knowledgeable and attentive teachers who create a supportive environment.

properties.name: Yonder Yoga - Buckhead
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a great workout. They highlight the supportive teachers.

properties.name: Life Time
properties.review_summary:
Some gym goers say this gym offers a variety of workout classes and has clean locker rooms with a spa, sauna, and steam room.

Other reviews mention the staff can be unfriendly and unhelpful.

properties.name: Highland Yoga Brookhaven
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a challenging and rewarding workout with a variety of classes suitable for all levels. They highlight the friendly and knowledgeable instructors, and the welcoming and supportive community. They also like the relaxing atmosphere and the refreshing lavender towels provided after class.

properties.name: Vista Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes with experienced teachers who provide clear instruction and encourage students to listen to their bodies. They also highlight the welcoming community and healing vibe.

properties.name: Element Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a good variety of classes. They highlight the unlimited monthly package is worth the price and the studio is clean. They also like the friendly and caring instructors.

properties.name: GGA Dwarf Goat Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers fun goat yoga sessions and goat cuddling experiences. They highlight the adorable goats, the calming and cute space, and the unique and relaxing way to have fun. They also like the friendly and helpful staff.

properties.name: Body & Brain Yoga Tai Chi
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes and workshops that provide a noticeable boost in energy levels, improved balance, and mental clarity. They highlight the small class sizes, personalized attention, and supportive environment that caters to all levels. They also like the knowledgeable and attentive instructors who tailor sessions to individual needs.

properties.name: HOTWORX - Brookhaven, GA
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers amazing workouts, including HOTWORX classes, and provides infrared benefits. They highlight the clean and chill facility, and the positive change in fitness and mental health. They also like the kind, informative, and helpful staff, and the attentive management.

properties.name: Central Rock Gym
properties.review_summary: People say this rock climbing center offers incredible walls, especially for lead climbing, and a variety of wall types, including the best slab walls. They highlight the spacious facilities, the free rentals, belay lessons, and group activities, and the supportive community of climbers. They also like the friendly staff and members.

properties.name: Life Time
properties.review_summary:
Some gym goers say this gym offers a wide variety of amenities, including a workout center, basketball, pickleball, and squash courts, multiple saunas, a jacuzzi, and indoor/outdoor pools. 

Other reviews mention the customer service can be poor and members can be inconsiderate.

properties.name: Highland Yoga Sandy Springs
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging and rewarding hot yoga classes, as well as a variety of other class types. They highlight the relaxing and peaceful environment, and the consistent class structure and flow. They also like the kind, personable, and knowledgeable instructors.

properties.name: Peachtree Yoga Center
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers expert yoga instruction and a comprehensive 200-hour yoga teacher training program. They highlight the peaceful and inviting atmosphere, and the strong sense of community among yogis. They also like the knowledgeable and supportive instructors.

properties.name: The World Famous Vertical Joes North: Flexibility Center | Private Pole Room Rentals
Onelife Fitness - Perimeter Sports Club
properties.review_summary:
People say this gym offers a wide variety of modern equipment, a pool, sauna, and basketball court, creating a full wellness center experience. They also highlight the clean facility, well-maintained equipment, and friendly, helpful staff.

Other reviews mention the gym can be crowded.

properties.name: HOTWORX - Sandy Springs, GA - Perimeter Center
Meraki Mama Collective: Prenatal Yoga & Doula Services
Yonder Yoga - Perimeter
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging hot yoga classes with a spiritual enlightenment dialogue at the beginning and end. They also highlight the clean facilities, helpful instructors, and welcoming atmosphere for all levels.

properties.name: Crunch Fitness - Perimeter
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers a variety of equipment and HIIT classes. They highlight the convenient location, clean facilities, and friendly, welcoming staff. They also like the motivating and energetic vibe.

properties.name: Crunch Fitness - Chamblee
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers a wide variety of free weights, machines, and racks, as well as a turf room, dance studio, and cycling studio. They highlight the affordable membership options and the friendly, helpful staff. They also like the clean facility and the positive, welcoming atmosphere.

properties.name: Sweatheory Roswell
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes and instructors, and the space is clean, cozy, and calming. They highlight the welcoming and friendly community, and the availability of amenities like saunas. They also like the knowledgeable and encouraging instructors.

properties.name: Crunch Fitness - Roswell
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers a wide variety of well-maintained equipment for both strength training and cardio, as well as HIIT classes and a sauna. They highlight the spacious layout, clean facilities, and fun music, creating a welcoming and energetic vibe. They also like the friendly, helpful, and high-energy staff, and the smooth sign-up process.

properties.name: HOTWORX - Johns Creek, GA - Alpharetta
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of workouts, including virtual sessions like Hot Bands and Hot Warriors, and infrared and heat treatments. They highlight the positive and supportive environment, and the friendly and helpful staff. They also like the clean facility.

properties.name: SPENGA Roswell
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers awesome workouts for everyone. They highlight the workouts are effective and never get boring. They also like the great team of instructors and the variety of time slot options.

properties.name: FlexElite Physical Therapy Clinic and Wellness Center
Lift Yoga Alpharetta
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes, including hot yoga sculpt, and encourages students of all levels to participate. They highlight the welcoming and kind instructors, and the comfortable and non-judgmental environment. They also like that classes are never overcrowded.

properties.name: Sukham Wellness - Ayurveda, Yoga, Hypnosis and Flower Essences
Infinity Hot Yoga
properties.review_summary:
People say this yoga studio offers challenging and exhilarating hot yoga classes, with a variety of options for all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners. They also highlight the supportive, knowledgeable, and encouraging instructors, and the welcoming, clean, and well-maintained space.

Some reviews mention the classes can be intense.

properties.name: Aum Studio for Wellness
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a diverse range of programs, including yoga, Pilates, cacao ceremonies, women's circles, and art classes. They highlight the supportive, healing, and welcoming atmosphere, and the knowledgeable and caring teachers. They also like the intentional and heart-centered experiences.

properties.name: Crunch Fitness - Johns Creek
properties.review_summary: People say this gym offers a variety of classes, machines, and perks, and the equipment is clean and well-maintained. They highlight the motivating energy, friendly staff, and welcoming environment. They also like the sauna and massage chairs.

properties.name: Life Time
properties.review_summary:
Some gym goers say this gym offers excellent customer service, top-notch equipment, amazing classes, and great instructors, and they appreciate the clean facilities and enjoyable atmosphere.

Other reviews mention the gym can be overcrowded and the pool can be unavailable during peak hours.

properties.name: Onelife Fitness - Crabapple
properties.review_summary:
Some gym goers say this gym has friendly and helpful staff, as well as knowledgeable personal trainers, and they appreciate the clean facilities and variety of equipment, including a movie theater cardio room.

Other reviews mention the gym can be crowded during peak hours and the cancellation policies can be difficult to navigate.

properties.name: Highland Yoga - Alpharetta
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers challenging hot yoga classes that improve flexibility and help with weight loss. They highlight the knowledgeable teachers, welcoming community, and clean facilities. They also like the convenient app for class sign-ups and the option to take classes at different locations.

properties.name: Crossroads Yoga
properties.review_summary: People say this yoga studio offers a variety of classes and has knowledgeable instructors who provide clear and encouraging guidance for all levels. They also highlight the welcoming and inclusive community atmosphere, making it a great place to practice yoga and connect with others.
